Gary Gray (Director) & 0 more Rated: PG-13 Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Action & Adventure Product Description: ["Now that Dominic Toretto (Vin Diesel) and Letty Ortiz (Michelle Rodriguez) are on their honeymoon, and Brian (Paul Walker) and Mia (Jordana Brewster) have retired from the game, and the rest of the crew has been exonerated, the globetrotting team has found a semblance of a normal life. But when a mysterious woman seduces Dom into the world of crime he can't seem to escape, and a betrayal of those closest to him, they will face trials that will test them as never before. From the shores of Cuba and the streets of New York City to the icy plains off the arctic Barents Sea, the elite force will crisscross the globe to stop an anarchist from unleashing chaos on the world's stage, and to bring home the man who made them a family. —harpreet phamber"] Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Fast & Furious 8, Furious Eight, Fast and Furious 8, DVD Movie, Blu-ray Movie, The Fast and the Furious 8, Action & Adventure/Thrillers, Cuba, Fast 8, Fast8, Furious 8, Action & Adventure, Mystery & Suspense, Fast EightFast & Furious 8, Furious Eight, Fast and Furious 8, DVD Movie, Blu-ray Movie, The Fast and the Furious 8, Action & Adventure/Thrillers, Cuba, Fast 8, Fast8, Furious 8, Action & Adventure, Mystery & Suspense, Fast Eight See more', 'Format': 'Color, NTSC, Subtitled, Digital_copy, Widescreen', 'Contributor': "F. Moritz, Vin Diesel, Michael Fottrell', 'Studio': 'Universal Pictures Home Entertainment', 'Writers': 'Chris Morgan', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: Great Review Title: We got the whole collection Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Trolls DHD Review Date: 2018/09/30 Store: Kendrick, Anna (Actor), Timberlake, Justin (Actor) Rated: PG Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Movies Product Description: ["From the creators of Shrek comes the most smart, funny, irreverent animated comedy of the year, DreamWorks' Trolls. This holiday season, enter a colorful, wondrous world populated by hilariously unforgettable characters and discover the story of the overly optimistic Trolls, with a constant song on their lips, and the comically pessimistic Bergens, who are only happy when they have trolls in their stomach. Featuring original music from Justin Timberlake, and soon-to-be classic mash-ups of songs from other popular artists, the film stars the voice talents of Anna Kendrick, Justin Timberlake, Russell Brand, James Corden, Kunal Nayyar, Ron Funches, Icona Pop, Gwen Stefani, and many more. DreamWorks' TROLLS is a fresh, broad comedy filled with music, heart and hair-raising adventures. In November of 2016, nothing can prepare you for our new Troll world."] Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Aspect Ratio': '2.35:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Item model number': '43448706', 'Media Format': 'Dolby, AC-3, Subtitled, Dubbed, Widescreen, NTSC', 'Run time': '92 minutes', 'Release date': 'February 7, 2017', 'Actors': 'Kendrick, Anna, Timberlake, Justin, Brand, Russell, Corden, James, Nayyar, Kunal', 'Dubbed': 'French, Spanish', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish, English, French', 'Studio': 'Universal Pictures Home Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: Such a happy movie we all love watching it Review Title: Fun and happy moods after Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Sausage Party Review Date: 2018/09/30 Store: Conrad Vernon (Director, Producer), Greg Tiernan (Director) Rated: R Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Sony Pictures Home Entertainment, All Sony Pictures Titles Product Description: ['In this CG-animated movie, one sausage leads a group of supermarket products on a quest to discover the truth about their existence and what really happens when they become chosen to leave the grocery store. The film features the vocal talents of some of today’s best comedy stars – Seth Rogen, Kristen Wiig, Jonah Hill, Bill Hader, Michael Cera, James Franco, Danny McBride, Craig Robinson, Paul Rudd, Nick Kroll, David Krumholtz, Edward Norton, and Salma Hayek.'] Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Comedy', 'Format': 'Dolby, NTSC, AC-3, Widescreen, Dubbed, Subtitled', 'Contributor': 'Evan Goldberg, Greg Tiernan, Great Beyond, LLC, Megan Ellison, Seth Rogen, Conrad Vernon', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 29 minutes', 'Digital Copy Expiration Date': 'December 31, 2019', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.85:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'R (Restricted)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.6 x 5.3 x 7.5 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Item model number': '43382325', 'Director': 'Conrad Vernon, Greg Tiernan', 'Media Format': 'Dolby, NTSC, AC-3, Widescreen, Dubbed, Subtitled', 'Run time': '1 hour and 29 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 8, 2016', 'Dubbed': 'French', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish, English, French', 'Producers': 'Conrad Vernon, Evan Goldberg, Megan Ellison, Seth Rogen', 'Studio': 'Sony Pictures Home Entertainment', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: Stupid. Its pretty foul but mostly stupid I don't mind foul language and stuff like that but it was kinda like they were trying to hard to be explicit. Wasn't as funny as I thought it would be. Review Title: ABSOLUTELY NOT FOR MINORS Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Cake Review Date: 2018/09/30 Store: Sam Worthington (Actor), Jennifer Aniston (Actor), Daniel Barnz (Director) & 0 more Rated: R Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment, All Fox Titles Product Description: ["Claire Simmons (Jennifer Aniston) is in pain. Her physical pain is evident in the scars that line her body and the way she carries herself, wincing with each tentative step. She's no good at hiding her emotional pain either. Blunt to the point of searing insult, Claire's anger seethes out of her with nearly every interaction. She has driven away her husband, her friends - even her chronic-pain support group has kicked her out. The only one left in Claire's otherwise solitary existence is her housekeeper-cum-caretaker, Silvana (Academy Award nominee Adriana Barraza), who barely tolerates her boss' need for liquor and prescription pills. But the suicide of Nina (Academy Award nominee Anna Kendrick), one of Claire's fellow chronic-pain group members, prompts another fixation. In pursuing questions about the death of a woman she barely knew, Claire explores the boundaries between life and death, abandonment and heartbreak, danger and salvation. As she inserts herself into the lives of Nina's husband (Sam Worthington) and the son Nina left behind, Claire just might find salvation."] Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'TCFHE', 'Item Weight': '0.1 Pounds', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Weight': '0.06 Kilograms', 'Aspect Ratio': '2.40:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'R (Restricted)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 1.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2311542', 'Director': 'Daniel Barnz', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, Subtitled, Widescreen, NTSC, DTS Surround Sound', 'Run time': '1 hour and 42 minutes', 'Release date': 'April 21, 2015', 'Actors': 'Sam Worthington, Jennifer Aniston, Anna Kendrick, Paula Cale, Mamie Gummer', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish, French, English', 'Studio': '20th Century Fox', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: Doesn't relate to the real thing and people. Was extremely disappointed I watched it once and not interested in watching it again Review Title: Boring not real Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Derailed (Theatrical Full Screen) Review Date: 2019/10/04 Store: Jennifer Aniston (Actor), Vincent Cassel (Actor), Mikael Hafstrom (Director) & 0 more Rated: Unrated Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Lionsgate Home Entertainment, All Lionsgate Titles Product Description: ["Advertising executive Charles Schine is just another Chicago commuter who regularly catches the 8:43 A.M. train to work. But the one day he misses his train and meets Lucinda Harris, his life is changed forever. Lucinda is charming, beautiful and seductive. Despite the fact that each are married with children, their attraction to one another is magnetic. Lunch dates quickly become cocktails after work, and before long, Charles and Lucinda's infatuation leads them to a hotel room. Their seemingly perfect affair goes terribly awry when LaRoche, a brutal stranger, breaks into their room and holds them at gunpoint. This once illicit liaison turns into a nightmare more dangerous and violent than either could have ever imagined. Charles' life soon becomes filled with deception, blackmail, violence and crime. Unable to confide in his wife or speak to the police, Charles finds himself trapped in a world he doesn't recognize, with no trace of the life he once knew."] Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Thriller', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, Subtitled, NTSC, Full Screen', 'Contributor': 'Jennifer Aniston, Mikael Hafstrom, Tom Conti, Melissa George, Clive Owen, Lorenzo Bonaventura, RZA, Vincent Cassel, Di Bonaventura Pictures; Miramax Films; Patalex V Productions LimitedJennifer Aniston, Mikael Hafstrom, Tom Conti, Melissa George, Clive Owen, Lorenzo Bonaventura, RZA, Vincent Cassel, Di Bonaventura Pictures; Miramax Films; Patalex V Productions Limited See more', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 48 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.75 x 5.75 x 0.5 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'WENC7862DVD', 'Director': 'Mikael Hafstrom', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, Subtitled, NTSC, Full Screen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 48 minutes', 'Release date': 'March 21, 2006', 'Actors': 'Jennifer Aniston, Vincent Cassel, Tom Conti, Melissa George, Clive Owen', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish', 'Producers': 'Lorenzo Bonaventura', 'Studio': 'Lionsgate', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: Stupid movie
Jennifer Aniston isn't so good just has a name.

But the one day he misses his train and meets Lucinda Harris, his life is changed forever. Lucinda is charming, beautiful and seductive. Despite the fact that each are married with children, their attraction to one another is magnetic. Lunch dates quickly become cocktails after work, and before long, Charles and Lucinda's infatuation leads them to a hotel room. Review Title: ABSOLUTELY NOT FOR MINORS Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Cake Review Date: 2018/09/30 Store: Sam Worthington (Actor), Jennifer Aniston (Actor), Daniel Barnz (Director) & 0 more Rated: R Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment, All Fox Titles Product Description: ["Claire Simmons (Jennifer Aniston) is in pain. Her physical pain is evident in the scars that line her body and the way she carries herself, wincing with each tentative step. She's no good at hiding her emotional pain either. Blunt to the point of searing insult, Claire's anger seethes out of her with nearly every interaction. She has driven away her husband, her friends - even her chronic-pain support group has kicked her out. The only one left in Claire's otherwise solitary existence is her housekeeper-cum-caretaker, Silvana (Academy Award nominee Adriana Barraza), who barely tolerates her boss' need for liquor and prescription pills. But the suicide of Nina (Academy Award nominee Anna Kendrick), one of Claire's fellow chronic-pain group members, prompts another fixation. In pursuing questions about the death of a woman she barely knew, Claire explores the boundaries between life and death, abandonment and heartbreak, danger and salvation. As she inserts herself into the lives of Nina's husband (Sam Worthington) and the son Nina left behind, Claire just might find salvation."] Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'TCFHE', 'Item Weight': '0.1 Pounds', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Weight': '0.06 Kilograms', 'Aspect Ratio': '2.40:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'R (Restricted)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 1.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2311542', 'Director': 'Daniel Barnz', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, Subtitled, Widescreen, NTSC, DTS Surround Sound', 'Run time': '1 hour and 42 minutes', 'Release date': 'April 21, 2015', 'Actors': 'Sam Worthington, Jennifer Aniston, Anna Kendrick, Paula Cale, Mamie Gummer', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish, French, English', 'Studio': '20th Century Fox', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: Doesn't relate to the real thing and people. But the one day he misses his train and meets Lucinda Harris, his life is changed forever. Lucinda is charming, beautiful and seductive. Despite the fact that each are married with children, their attraction to one another is magnetic. Lunch dates quickly become cocktails after work, and before long, Charles and Lucinda's infatuation leads them to a hotel room. Their seemingly perfect affair goes terribly awry when LaRoche, a brutal stranger, breaks into their room and holds them at gunpoint. This once illicit liaison turns into a nightmare more dangerous and violent than either could have ever imagined. Charles' life soon becomes filled with deception, blackmail, violence and crime. Unable to confide in his wife or speak to the police, Charles finds himself trapped in a world he doesn't recognize, with no trace of the life he once knew."] Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Thriller', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, Subtitled, NTSC, Full Screen', 'Contributor': 'Jennifer Aniston, Mikael Hafstrom, Tom Conti, Melissa George, Clive Owen, Lorenzo Bonaventura, RZA, Vincent Cassel, Di Bonaventura Pictures; Miramax Films; Patalex V Productions LimitedJennifer Aniston, Mikael Hafstrom, Tom Conti, Melissa George, Clive Owen, Lorenzo Bonaventura, RZA, Vincent Cassel, Di Bonaventura Pictures; Miramax Films; Patalex V Productions Limited See more', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 48 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.75 x 5.75 x 0.5 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'WENC7862DVD', 'Director': 'Mikael Hafstrom', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, Subtitled, NTSC, Full Screen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 48 minutes', 'Release date': 'March 21, 2006', 'Actors': 'Jennifer Aniston, Vincent Cassel, Tom Conti, Melissa George, Clive Owen', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish', 'Producers': 'Lorenzo Bonaventura', 'Studio': 'Lionsgate', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: Stupid movie

**Summary of Preferences and Patterns:**

- **Genre Preference**: Strong inclination towards **Action**, **Comedy**, and **Drama** genres. Notable purchases include titles with high-energy action sequences and humorous themes.
- **Rating Trends**: Favors films with **high ratings** (4.4 and above), indicating a preference for quality content.
- **Movie Themes**: Enjoys narratives that revolve around **friendship**, **family dynamics**, **thrills**, and **adventure**. Engages with both light-hearted animations and serious dramas, suggesting a balanced taste in storylines.
- **Suitability Ratings**: Shows a mixed reception to **MPAA ratings**; enjoys **PG** and **PG-13** titles, but is also drawn to **R-rated** content that includes substantial comedic elements or complex themes.
- **Office-Friendly Reviews**: Often reviews movies with a personal touch, indicating strong emotional reactions—positively for joyous films and critically for disappointing ones.
- **Rewatchability Factor**: Selects films noted for **high enjoyment and humor**, indicating a penchant for light entertainment that can be revisited, while expressing disappointment towards films perceived as lacking authenticity or engagement.
- **Actor Preferences**: Shows a recurring pattern of favoring certain actors, highlighting a connection to performances that resonate with their tastes and familiarity.

Overall, the individual demonstrates a dynamic and engaging view towards movie consumption, favoring entertainment that balances thrill and enjoyment through diverse storytelling genres.

target_interaction.title: Downhill with her
target_interaction.text:
I’m watching zoey 101 with my granddaughter like I did with her mom and I like the show or did until the new RA comes my goodness all she does is eat cry and scream man I thought it was bad with the one girl that screeched that finally calmed down and now this annoying pig
Crying about her boyfriend like these girls should be hearing about it
I just don’t see why they brought adult drama into a teenage show it should be the kids having problems if anything
And her voice is so awful
I don’t think the show was canceled the way it was said I think it went down hill with her
